title: Design and document the rhythm game mechanics
description: Design/spec session for the guitar-hero style game. Produces a markdown design doc covering: lane layout, input mapping, game flow (start/play/score), timing model, scoring model, audio strategy, difficulty. DoD: design doc committed to repo, detailed enough to derive implementation beads from it.

title: Set up Go + Ebitengine WASM scaffold on /game route
description: Set up the foundational plumbing so a Go + Ebitengine game compiles to WASM and renders in the browser on a new /game route. Includes: game/ Go module, Ebitengine dependency, hello-world main.go, wasm_exec.js, build script, React Router integration, and GamePage.tsx component that loads the WASM. DoD: /game renders the Ebitengine hello-world screen; existing site unaffected.
